title: 78/360/EEC: Commission Decision of 31 March 1978 authorizing certain Member States to sell butter at a reduced price in the form of concentrated butter (Only the German, French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 31 March 1971  authorizing certain Member States to sell butter at a reduced price in the form of concentrated butter  (Only the German, French and Dutch texts are authentic)  (78/360/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The Federal Republic of Germany, the Kingdom of Belgium, the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and the Kingdom of the Netherlands are hereby authorized to have recourse to the provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 649/78 in respect of quantities not exceeding those specified in paragraph 2.
2. The quantities referred to in paragraph 1 are as follows: >PIC FILE= "T0012795">
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany, the Kingdom of Belgium, the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 March 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
